channel.title: CVE Feed for ThemeFusion -- Fusion Builder
channel.description: The latest CVEs for ThemeFusion -- Fusion Builder

item.title: CVE-2023-39310|2024-06-20T13:32:44.893Z -- themefusion -- fusion%20builder
item.description: Missing Authorization vulnerability in ThemeFusion Fusion Builder.This issue affects Fusion Builder: from n/a through 3.11.1.

item.title: CVE-2023-39311|2024-03-27T13:29:26.104Z -- themefusion -- fusion%20builder
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in ThemeFusion Fusion Builder.This issue affects Fusion Builder: from n/a through 3.11.1.

item.title: CVE-2023-39306|2024-03-27T05:42:25.173Z -- themefusion -- fusion%20builder
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in ThemeFusion Fusion Builder allows Reflected XSS.This issue affects Fusion Builder: from n/a through 3.11.1.

item.title: CVE-2023-39309|2024-06-04T17:26:55.907Z -- themefusion -- fusion%20builder
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Special Elements used in an SQL Command ('SQL Injection') vulnerability in ThemeFusion Fusion Builder.This issue affects Fusion Builder: from n/a through 3.11.1.

item.title: CVE-2023-39310|2024-06-19T14:07:17.747Z -- themefusion -- fusion%20builder
item.description: Missing Authorization vulnerability in ThemeFusion Fusion Builder.This issue affects Fusion Builder: from n/a through 3.11.1.
